org.xchain.framework.security

Interface Permission

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AllPermission, CriteriaEntityPermission, EntityClassPermission, EntityPermission, HqlEntityPermission, QualifiedEntityPermission

    public interface Permission
extends java.io.Serializable
    A Permission represents what an Identity is allowed to do.
    Author:
    Jason Rose, Christian Trimble

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean implies(Permission permission)
      Implies is the mechanism by which we verify that an authenticated Identity can perform an action.

    • Method Detail

      • implies

        boolean implies(Permission permission)
        Implies is the mechanism by which we verify that an authenticated Identity can perform an action.
        Parameters:
        permission - The operation being checked.
        Returns:
        true if the Identity is able to perform this operation, or a superset of this operation's functionality; false otherwise.
